statements: UPDATE students SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE student_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE students SET age = 18, grade_level = 12 WHERE first_name = 'Bob' AND last_name = 'Johnson';
UPDATE students SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Johnson', age=25, grade_level=10 WHERE student_id='f4ba7777-9856-4c40-92df-2b18837d83f2';
UPDATE students SET last_name='Smith', grade_level=11, first_name='Bob', age=22 WHERE student_id='308ed1c1-b95c-4878-8316-54827fef0f42';
UPDATE students SET math_score = 90 WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE grades SET grade_letter = 'B' WHERE student_id = 2 AND subject = 'Math';
UPDATE students SET grade_level = 9, math_score = 95 WHERE student_id = 12345;
UPDATE grades SET grade_letter = 'A', subject = 'Math' WHERE student_id = 12345 AND subject = 'Math';
UPDATE students SET age = 20, student_name = 'John Doe' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET credits = 4, course_name = 'Programming 101' WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE students SET age = 20, grade_level = 12 WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET credits = 4, course_name = 'Advanced Mathematics' WHERE course_id = 2;
UPDATE students SET age = 20, major = 'Computer Science' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE grades SET grade = 95.5 WHERE student_id = 3 AND course_id = 2;
UPDATE students SET age = 25, GPA = 3.5 WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET department = 'Computer Science', room_number = 'Room 301A' WHERE course_id = 2;
UPDATE students SET age = 20 WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE courses SET start_date = '2022-09-01', end_date = '2022-12-15' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE students SET age = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'John Doe', start_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE course_id = 101;
